message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than what most people pay for similar products. Considering its worth to you, I'm extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $9,500. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you, aiming to provide you with exceptional value while maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your positive response.
